description.en: A young and inquisitive Clavat. He lived peacefully with his twin sister、 Chelinka、 his father、 Latov、 and the other villagers until a mysterious man attacks and drastically alters their lives. As his father would have wished、 Yuri bravely opposes the Lunites in order to protect Chelinka and his friends.
description.jp:
好奇心旺盛なクラヴァット族の少年。
双子の姉チェリンカ 父ラトフや仲間た
ちと共に平穏に暮らしていたが 謎の男
の襲撃を受けたことにより運命が激変。
父の遺志を継ぎ チェリンカや故郷の
仲間たちを守るため 「月の民」の
野望に勇ましく立ち向かった。

jp.text: どうしたらいいかわからないけど ボクは大切な人を守りたい
生きて 生きて 生き抜いてやる！
強い心の前に思いどおりにならないことなんてないんだ
ボクは逃げない\n生き残るためなら\nどんなことでもする
イヤなものから目をそらすのは\n簡単だけど それじゃ\n何も見えてこないよ
目を閉じて何も知らないまま\n終わるのなら ボクは傷ついても\n大切なものを守りたい

gl.text: I don't know what I'm supposed to do、 but I have to protect those I love.
I'm gonna survive. I'm gonna stay alive. I'm never giving up!
There is nothing you can't do、 if your will is strong enough.
I can't just run away. I'm going to do whatever it takes to survive.
It's easy to look away when we see what we don't want to see、 but then we'd be missing something.
I'd rather go through the hurt of seeing painful truths than close my eyes and never know.

desc.en:
Reduces enemy BRV to 0 (except broken enemies) before attacking
5-HIT Holy AoE ranged BRV Attack + AoE HP Attack
Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target
Deals 100% HP damage to all enemies
Raises allies' BRV based on damage dealt
Inflicts [Holy Resistance Down] to target for 6 turns
Grants [United Halves: Crystal Wielders] for 2 turns
Recovers 1 use of [Power of the Crystal] and [Rela Crystal] after use (up to the initial values)

When [United Halves: Crystal Wielders] is active:
• Slightly raises party Attack
• Slightly raises party Max BRV overflow limit
• Raises party member's BRV by Max BRV at the start of party member's turn
• Grants HP Regen
※Does not stack with same buff
desc.gl:
Reduces all enemies' BRV to 0 (excluding enemies afflicted with Break)
5-hit group Holy ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Deals total HP damage to each target
Grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt
All targets: 6 turns Holy Resist Down
Self: 2 turns special effect Crystal User – Two Halves
Crystal Power, Rela Crystal use +1 after use (with upper limit)
While special effect Crystal User – Two Halves active:
 • Slightly raises party's ATK, amount stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV
 • Grants ally HP Regen effect, BRV based on individual MAX BRV at start of each allies' turn
 • (Does not stack with special effects of same name)
desc.jp:
ブレイク中の敵を除く 敵全体のBRVを0にし
5HIT聖属性全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
与えるHPダメージは等倍
与えたHPダメージに依存した量のBRVを
自身以外の味方全員に加算
対象に6ACTION「聖耐性ダウン」付与
自身に2ACTION特殊効果「ふたりのハーフ・クリスタル使い」付与
使用後 「クリスタルの力」
「レラ・クリスタル」の使用回数＋1（上限あり）
特殊効果「ふたりのハーフ・クリスタル使い」付与中
味方全員の攻撃力と
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限小アップし
味方の行動開始時それぞれの最大BRVに依存した量のBRV加算と
HPリジェネの効果（同名の特殊効果は重複しない）
